name: Advanced Drawing: Experimental Practice
description: This course continues to build on VIS205H1 Drawing: Experimental Practices. Experimenting with a wide-ranging set of concepts, materials, techniques, and processes, students further explore the potential of drawing beyond its traditional and preconceived limits.
division: John H. Daniels Faculty of Architecture, Landscape, & Design
department: John H. Daniels Faculty of Architecture, Landscape, & Design
